description:
11.28 chromashift
Shift chroma pixels horizontally and/or vertically.

The filter accepts the following options:

cbh.description: Set amount to shift chroma-blue horizontally.

cbv.description: Set amount to shift chroma-blue vertically.

crh.description: Set amount to shift chroma-red horizontally.

crv.description: Set amount to shift chroma-red vertically.

edge.description: Set edge mode, can be smear, default, or warp.
